channel.title: Revamped 711 / VPS / Bosses / Great eco / PK / Clan wars / Much more content!
channel.description:
[size=undefinedpt]Revamped[/size]
[i]Hi guys! This is my 711 server just take a look:D[/i]
[img]http://gyazo.com/a5b206f01d32b171eb6246743bcb862d.png?1357219107[/img] [size=14pt]Lunars working (Curses, Ancients too)[/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/f0322335bab13377be5738d4ba1ece5b.png?1357219319[/img] [size=14pt]Skill cape editor 100% working![/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/2e91f2337bd445506e568dbc043ae0cb.png?1357219425[/img] [size=14pt]Working on G.E![/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/2f28dcfb10c6f20ac030db44beea616f.png?1357219514[/img] [size=14pt]Loads of juicy shops Made by the Co-Owner![/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/2b73f31a7e519a31fab0cb0cf6b0f293.png?1357219591[/img] [size=14pt]100% corp![/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/64e06bb8476907ab3990ab6353db4311.png?1357219702[/img] [size=14pt]Clan wars (Newest update)[/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/78e8896971514e04c07f3e9aafcc4cde.png?1357219828[/img] [size=14pt]See you soon <3[/size] [img]http://gyazo.com/0cf1aca00733ca060526ce6e32e81ac6.png?1357219969[/img]
Some other stuff: Makeovermage fixed Random rewards every 30 minutes (Rares) Mystery box Glacors (Drop chaotics, 1-10m gp) Thieving Wguild Dungeoneering (WORKING) Bandos Dominion Tower PK Points system LOTS OF MORE STUFF!
Our website: http://www.revampedrsps.cz.cc/ Our webclient: http://www.revampedrsps.cz.cc/webclient.php/ Download client (Also avaible on site) http://www.mediafire.com/?5b4ujw9z8y55nb4 <Mediafire
